title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file with another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer, the synchronization fails.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the package viewer, the synchronization fails.
EB: The synchronization should successfully synchronize the .java file with the selected resource.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer
2. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file)
3. Attempt to synchronize the two resources
